Ingredients.2: 8  4-ounce Mason® jars with lids and rings

Directions.1: Place a sous vide cooker inside a large heat-proof container filled with water. Preheat the water bath to 179 degrees F (82 degrees C).

Directions.2: Melt sugar in a small saucepan over medium heat until browned, about 5 minutes. Pour hot melted sugar into eight 4 ounce Mason jars, enough to cover the bottom of each.

Directions.3: Mix sweetened condensed milk, evaporated milk, eggs, and vanilla extract together in a separate bowl. Add to the jars; seal.

Directions.4: Place jars in the water bath and set timer for 1 hour.

Directions.5: Remove jars from the water bath. Let flan cool until safe to handle, about 20 minutes.

Directions.6: Unseal jars and run a small rubber spatula around the sides of the flan. Top each flan with a plate;invert and gently shake to release.
